text:
In Wednesday's COVID-19 briefing, Pres. Trump:
- inaccurately declared he has absolute power over state coronavirus restrictions
- falsely claimed "nobody needs" ventilators anymore
- accused the WHO of perpetrating a "cover-up" without providing evidence https://t.co/WxEx7FyZW8
